description: Bulk samples of fresh leaves for spectral and trait measurements.

elements.description: The site within which the subplot is located. Used to filter out plots located outside of the selected site.
elements.label: Filter: Site

elements.description:
The plant from which the leaf sample is taken from.

Before creating a new plant record, ask co-workers if the record has been created on another device but not yet synced.

If not, create a new plant record.
elements.label: Plant

elements.description:
NB: NE PAS SUPPRIMER CE CHAMP!
Visible uniquement pour les anciennes donnÃ©es avant 10 Juil 2018
elements.label: Plant

elements.description: Comments or notes about the plant.
elements.label: Plant Remarks

elements.description: The date when the leaf sample was collected.
elements.label: Date Sampled

elements.description: The time of day when the sample was collected.
elements.label: Time Sampled

elements.description: A list of names of people responsible for collecting the leaf sample. The primary collector, especially one who applies a personal identifier (Sample ID or Barcode), should be listed first.
elements.label: Sampled By

elements.description: Unique field ID for the leaf sample. Defined automatically as the Unix timestamp (= number fo seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00UTC) - 1519142458.
elements.label: Sample ID

elements.description: A barcode or QR code that identifies the sample.
elements.label: Sample Barcode

elements.description: Comments or notes about the sample.
elements.label: Sample Remarks

elements.description: Photos of plant part being sampled, or of sample.
elements.label: Sample Photos

name: Bulk Leaf Samples

status_field.description: Status of record. Record first requires verification. Once verified, it can be submitted for approval; this locks the record for standard users. If approved, the record eventually gets published. If rejected, it goes back to standard users for further verification.
status_field.label: Record Status
